exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.BrSeatSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:chessCommonLib="chessCommonLib.*" minWidth="10" minHeight="10" width="90" height="90">
	<e:Image id="empty_bg" left="-11" right="-10" top="-10" bottom="-12" source="br_seatHead_png" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
	<chessCommonLib:Head id="head" left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="lb_bg_img" source="name_bg_mask_png" bottom="0" left="0" right="0" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="nickName_lbl" text="aaaaa" size="22" left="0" right="0" textAlign="center" multiline="false" height="22" bottom="25" visible="false"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="chips_lbl" text="11" left="0" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75" right="0" textAlign="center" y="82"  visible="false" font="jinbi_num_fnt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameTaskButtonSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
<e:Image id="light_rotate" x="50" y="50" source="guang01_png" width="100" height="100" anchorOffsetX="50" anchorOffsetY="50" visible="false"/>
	<e:Button id="game_task" x="4" y="12">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="91" height="75" source="task_png" source.down="task_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="progress_text" text="(0/8)" y="82" x="22" size="24" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textAlign="center" textColor="0xaec6fe"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.HeadSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  minWidth="10" minHeight="10">
	<e:Image id="avar_img" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image id="avarFrame_img" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="2" source=""/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ShiShiCaiButtonSkin" width="100" height="110" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="_ratote" source="guang01_png" anchorOffsetX="50" anchorOffsetY="50" x="50" y="48" visible="false"/>
	<e:Button name="ssc" x="10">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ssc_btn1_png" source.down="ssc_btn2_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	
	<e:Label id="_timer" text="Label" y="82" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="18" textColor="0xdcffff" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="-1" textAlign="center" x="24"/>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.SysMsgMcSkin" width="561" height="39" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
    <e:Image  width="561" height="39"  source="mjl_lobby_systembg_png" />
	<!--<e:Label id="_msgTxt" size="24"  textColor="0xffffff"  fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" multiline="false" verticalAlign="middle" text=""/>-->
    <e:Image id="_vipIcon" source="vip_small1_png" scaleX="0.7" scaleY="0.7"/>
    <e:Image id="_worldchat" source="sys_msg_click_png" x="548"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.LobbyChatFcaeItemSkin" width="67" height="67" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="faceIcon" x="0" y="0" source=""/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.LobbyChatFcaePanelSkin" width="920" height="320" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">



	<e:Image source="sz_common_chat_facebg" y="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>

	<e:Scroller id="scroll" width="892" height="308.66" x="13" y="7.67" scrollPolicyV="off" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Group y="-139.67" x="22" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
			 <e:List id="faceList" width="888.67" height="284.66" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.LobbyChatFcaeItemSkin"
                anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" y="10"  x="0">
            <e:ArrayCollection>
                <e:Array>
                    <e:Object/>
                    <e:Object/>
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
					 <e:Object dsf="null" />
					  <e:Object dsf="null" />
					   <e:Object dsf="null" />
                </e:Array>
            </e:ArrayCollection>
            <e:layout>
                <e:TileLayout requestedColumnCount="9" horizontalGap="31" verticalGap="33" paddingLeft="20" />
            </e:layout>
        </e:List>

		 <e:List id="faceList1" width="888.67" height="284.66" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.LobbyChatFcaeItemSkin"
                anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" y="10"  x="900">
            <e:ArrayCollection>
                <e:Array>
                    <e:Object/>
                    <e:Object/>
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
                    <e:Object dsf="null" />
					 <e:Object dsf="null" />
					  <e:Object dsf="null" />
					   <e:Object dsf="null" />
                </e:Array>
            </e:ArrayCollection>
            <e:layout>
                <e:TileLayout requestedColumnCount="9" horizontalGap="31" verticalGap="33" paddingLeft="20" />
            </e:layout>
        </e:List>
		
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
			<e:Image id="page1Point1" source="sz_common_Chat_json.sz_common_chat_point1" y="304" horizontalCenter="-54.5"/>
        	<e:Image id="page1Point2" source="sz_common_Chat_json.sz_common_chat_point2" y="304" horizontalCenter="-54.5"/>
			<e:Image id="page2Point1" source="sz_common_Chat_json.sz_common_chat_point1" y="304" horizontalCenter="-4.5"/>
            <e:Image id="page2Point2" source="sz_common_Chat_json.sz_common_chat_point2" y="304" horizontalCenter="-4.5"/>
    
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.LobbyChatListItemSkin"  xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="960">
	<e:Label id="chat_lb" size="27" maxChars="60" text=""  lineSpacing="5" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" left="8" top="3" fontFamily="null1" multiline="true" width="949" bottom="6" textColor="0x239924" visible="false"/>
		<e:Label id="name_lb" size="27"  x="106" y="7" width="198" height="26" fontFamily="null1" textColor="0x000000" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="vipIcon" source="mid_vip12" x="5.5" y="0" visible="false"/>
	<!--<e:Image id="chat_line" source="sz_common_Chat_json.sz_common_chat_line" x="5" bottom="0" visible="false"/>-->
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.LobbyChatPanelSkin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="loadingTip">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{loading_img}">
				<tween:To duration="3000">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{360}" />
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Image source="sz_common_Chat_json.sz_common_chat_bg" y="78.33" horizontalCenter="0" locked="true" />
	<e:Image id="loading_img" anchorOffsetX="58" anchorOffsetY="58" y="316" source="Emojchat_loading_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
	<e:Button id="chatSend" label="" x="1042.83" y="587" anchorOffsetX="66.33" anchorOffsetY="35.67" width="130">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image source="sz_common_chat_sendBtn1" source.down="sz_common_chat_sendBtn1" scaleX.down="1.05"
				         scaleY.down="1.05" />
				<e:Image id="sendDisable" source="sz_common_chat_sendBtn2" source.down="sz_common_chat_sendBtn2" visible="false" />
				<e:Image id="send_word" source="sz_common_chat_send" source.down="sz_common_chat_send" horizontalCenter="0"
				         verticalCenter="0.5" scaleX.down="1.1" scaleY.down="1.1" anchorOffsetX="54.67" anchorOffsetY="20" visible="true" />
				<e:Image id="send_wordDisable" source="sz_common_chat_send2" source.down="sz_common_chat_send2" horizontalCenter="0"
				         verticalCenter="0.5" scaleX.down="1.1" scaleY.down="1.1" anchorOffsetX="54.67" anchorOffsetY="20" />
				<e:Label size="33" fontFamily="null1" id="sendClock" text="" x="11.33" y="8" verticalAlign="middle"
				         textAlign="center" anchorOffsetX="0" width="110.34" anchorOffsetY="0" height="53" />
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="chatClose" label="" x="1120.5" y="53.83" anchorOffsetX="29" anchorOffsetY="25">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image source="sz_Lobby_help_close" source.down="sz_Lobby_help_close" scaleX.down="1.1" scaleY.down="1.1" />
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Scroller id="chatScroll" width="963" height="420.33" x="159" y="109" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"
	            bounces="false" scrollPolicyH="off">
		<e:List id="chatList" height="453.66" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.LobbyChatListItemSkin"
		        anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" y="-30.67" x="0">
			<e:ArrayCollection>
				<e:Array>
					<e:Object x="1" y="2" />
					<e:Object/>
					<e:Object dsf="null" />
					<e:Object dsf="null" />
					<e:Object dsf="null" />
					<e:Object dsf="null" />
					<e:Object dsf="null" />
					<e:Object dsf="null" />
				</e:Array>
			</e:ArrayCollection>
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="justify" gap="4" verticalAlign="top" />
			</e:layout>
		</e:List>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Image id="chatFaceIcon" source="sz_common_Chat_json.sz_common_chat_icon" x="805.33" y="561.33" />
	<e:Image id="hornIcon" source="sz_common_Chat_json.sz_common_chat_horn" x="874" y="565.83" />
	<e:Image source="sz_common_Chat_json.sz_common_chat_mask" x="162" y="550.33" scale9Grid="74,15,448,18"
	         anchorOffsetY="0" height="70" anchorOffsetX="0" width="640" />
	<!--<chesscommonlib:LobbyChatFaceComponent id="chatFacePanel" width="926.67" height="310.67" x="178.33" y="194.66"
	                                           anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" visible="false" />
	-->
	<e:EditableText id="chatContentLable" width="623" height="64" size="27" text="" x="171" y="555.33" anchorOffsetY="0"
	                anchorOffsetX="0" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0x050505"
	                fontFamily="null1" multiline="true" prompt="请在此输入内容，总长度不超过40个字" />
	<e:Label id="hornNum" text="" x="913" y="574" fontFamily="null1" size="24" width="63" textAlign="center" />
	<!--<e:Component width="926.67" height="310.67" x="178.33" y="194.66" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"
	                 skinName="chesscommonlib.LobbyChatFaceComponent" visible="false" />
	-->
		<e:Rect id="touchMask" fillColor="0xfcfcfc" fillAlpha="0" anchorOffsetX="0" width="1278.33" anchorOffsetY="0" height="723" touchEnabled="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.Chat2LabaItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" height="93">
	<e:Image source="chat_userlist_bg_png" scale9Grid="17,13,45,46" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="avar_img" source="chat_laba_icon_png" x="14" y="6.5"/>
	<e:Image id="frame_img" width="60" height="60" x="11.5" y="14" source="chat_input_png" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" locked="true" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="gold_lb" y="15" size="26" textColor="0xfdf4a9" left="66" right="0" maxChars="60" text="{data.text}"/>
	<e:Image source="chat_vip_icon_png" x="65.5" y="7"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonlib.Chat2ListItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="avar_img" y="19" anchorOffsetX="0" width="49" anchorOffsetY="0" height="46" left="0" source="{data.headUrl}"/>
	<e:Label id="name_txt" text="{data.nickName}" x="62" y="20" size="20" textColor="0x14142a" fontFamily="null1"/>
	<e:Label id="time_txt" text="{data.time}" y="20" size="20" textColor="0x14142A" fontFamily="null1" right="0"/>
	<e:Image source="chat_chat_bg_png" scale9Grid="24,23,84,32" right="0" left="52" bottom="0" top="48" locked="true"/>
	<e:Label id="chat_txt" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" right="13" left="79" top="62" bottom="12" size="23" fontFamily="null1" lineSpacing="6" text="{data.words}"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.Chat2ListSkin" width="415" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group width="396" height="60" x="9" y="653" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Image source="chat_input_bg_png" scale9Grid="8,7,49,46" right="0" left="0" bottom="0" top="0" locked="true" />
		<e:Button id="roomType_btn" label="" x="5.5" verticalCenter="0.5">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_room_btn_normal_png" source.down="chat_room_btn_normal_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="labaType_btn" label="" x="5.5" verticalCenter="0.5">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_laba_btn_normal_png" source.down="chat_laba_btn_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image source="chat_input_png" anchorOffsetX="0" scale9Grid="6,5,38,34" verticalCenter="0" height="44" left="92"
		         right="76" />
		<e:Button id="send_bt" label="" verticalCenter="0.5" x="323">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_send_normal_png" source.down="chat_send_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:EditableText id="chat_etxt" height="31" text="" y="14" anchorOffsetX="0" left="99" right="83"
		                fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0x14142a" size="24" verticalAlign="middle" prompt="请输入聊天内容" />
		<!--<e:Button id="voice_btn" label="" x="282" y="14" visible="false">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_voice_normal_png" source.down="chat_voice_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>-->
	</e:Group>
	<e:Scroller id="chat_scr" left="15" right="15" top="20" bottom="82">
		<e:Group>
			<e:List id="chat_lst" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.Chat2ListItemSkin" right="0" left="0">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="justify" verticalAlign="top" gap="10" />
				</e:layout>
			</e:List>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Group id="chat_select_grp" x="15" y="590">
		<e:Button id="labaDrop_btn" label="">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_laba_drop_normal_png" source.down="chat_laba_drop_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="roomDrop_btn" label="">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_room_drop_normal_png" source.down="chat_room_drop_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.Chat2UserSkin" width="458" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image x="0" width="420" top="0" bottom="0" source="chat2_bg_png" scale9Grid="12,11,22,24"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="chat_btn" label="" y="199" left="417">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat2_btn_png" source.down="chat2_btn_png" source.disabled="chat2_btn_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="noseat_btn" label="" y="368" left="417">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat2_noseat_btn_png" source.down="chat2_noseat_btn_png" source.disabled="chat2_noseat_btn_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.User2ListItemSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" height="93">
	<e:Image source="chat_userlist_bg_png" scale9Grid="17,13,45,46" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="avar_img" width="55" height="55" x="14" y="17" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="{data.headUrl}"/>
	<e:Image id="frame_img" width="60" height="60" x="11.5" y="14" source="chat_input_png" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" locked="true" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="name_lb" y="10.5" textColor="0xabc2ff" horizontalCenter="37" text="{data.nickName}"/>
	<e:Label id="gold_lb" text="{data.remainder}" y="49" size="26" textColor="0xfdf4a9" horizontalCenter="37"/>
	<e:Image source="chat_coin_png" x="91" y="41" anchorOffsetX="0" width="45" anchorOffsetY="0" height="45"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.User2ListSkin" width="400" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="loadingTip">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{loading_img}">
				<tween:To duration="3000">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{360}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Scroller width="363" height="680" x="19" y="20">
		<e:Group>
			<e:List id="noseat_lst" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" right="0" left="0" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.User2ListItemSkin">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="justify" verticalAlign="top" paddingTop="0"/>
				</e:layout>
				<e:ArrayCollection>
					<e:Array>
						<e:Object id="null" headUrl="null" nickName="null" remainder="null"/>
					</e:Array>
				</e:ArrayCollection>
			</e:List>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Image id="loading_img" source="chat_loading_png" anchorOffsetX="18" anchorOffsetY="18" x="202" y="361"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.ChatLabaItemSkin3" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image left="0" right="1" top="0" bottom="-7" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" source="3chat_userlist_bg_png" scale9Grid="15,11,4,13"/>
	<e:Image x="13" y="4.5" source="3chat_laba_icon_png"/>
	<e:Label id="notice_lb" size="23" textColor="0xfdf4a9" maxChars="60" text="testrgergwergewgwegwergg"  lineSpacing="10" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" right="13" left="123" top="6" bottom="5" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei"/>
	<e:Image id="chat_laba_vip_img" source="chat_vip_icon_png" x="65.5" y="7"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.ChatListItemSkin3" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="386">
	<e:Image id="avar_img" y="19" anchorOffsetX="0" width="49" anchorOffsetY="0" height="46" source="{data.data.headUrl}" x="20"/>
	<e:Image id="vip_img" y="-1" anchorOffsetX="0" width="105" anchorOffsetY="0" height="90" x="-9" source="{data.data.vipLevel}"/>
	
	<e:Label id="name_txt" text="{data.data.nickName}" x="88" y="9" size="20" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0xffffff"/>


	<e:Label id="time_txt" y="10" size="20" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" right="1" text="1231231" textColor="0xffffff"/>
	<e:Image left="90" bottom="12" top="37" right="2" width="306" anchorOffsetX="0" source="3chat_chat_bg_png" height="30" anchorOffsetY="0" scale9Grid="23,25,11,9"/>
	<e:Label id="chat_txt" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" right="4" left="109" top="43" bottom="22" size="23" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" lineSpacing="6" text="{data.data.words}"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.ChatListSkin3" width="408" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group width="100%" height="60" x="0" y="653" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">

		<e:Button id="roomType_btn" label="" x="5.5" verticalCenter="0.5" width="82" height="48">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="mjl_common_button1_png" source.down="mjl_common_button2_png"/>
				<e:Image source="3chat_room_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>

		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="labaType_btn" label="" x="5" verticalCenter="0.5" width="82" height="48">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="mjl_common_button1_png" source.down="mjl_common_button2_png"/>
				<e:Image source="3chat_laba_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>

		</e:Button>
		<e:Image anchorOffsetX="0" verticalCenter="0" height="48" left="91"
		         right="89"  width="225" source="3chat_userlist_bg_png" scale9Grid="14,11,8,12"/>
		<e:Button id="send_bt" label="" verticalCenter="1" x="322.68" anchorOffsetX="0" width="82" height="48">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="mjl_common_button1_png" source.down="mjl_common_button2_png"/>
				<e:Image source="3chat_send_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>

		</e:Button>
		<e:EditableText id="chat_etxt" height="31" text="" y="14" anchorOffsetX="0" left="99" right="99"
		                fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0xffffff" size="24" verticalAlign="middle" prompt="请输入聊天内容"  promptColor="0x807adc"/>
		<!--<e:Button id="voice_btn" label="" x="282" y="14" visible="false">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_voice_normal_png" source.down="chat_voice_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>-->
	</e:Group>
	<e:Scroller id="chat_scr" width="386" x="10" y="10" height="630">
		<e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
			<e:List id="chat_lst" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.ChatListItemSkin3" x="0" y="0" width="386">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="justify" verticalAlign="top" gap="10" />
				</e:layout>
			</e:List>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Group id="chat_select_grp" x="5" y="605">
		<e:Button id="labaDrop_btn" label="" width="82" height="48">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="mjl_common_button1_png" source.down="mjl_common_button2_png"/>
				<e:Image source="3chat_laba_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>

		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="roomDrop_btn" label="" width="82" height="48" x="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="mjl_common_button1_png" source.down="mjl_common_button2_png"/>
				<e:Image source="3chat_room_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>

		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.ChatUserSkin3" width="458" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image x="2" width="406" top="0" bottom="0"  source="3chat_noset_bg_png" scale9Grid="14,12,29,31"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="chat_btn" label="" y="216" x="408">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="3chat_chat_normal_png" source.down="3chat_chat_selected_png" source.disabled="3chat_chat_selected_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>

	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="noseat_btn" label="" y="362" x="408">

			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="3chat_noset_normal2_png" source.down="3chat_noset_selected_png" source.disabled="3chat_noset_selected_png"/>

			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="mess_count"  height="20" y="427" font="room_num_fnt" text="0" x="412" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.UserListItemSkin3" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" height="87" width="386">

	<e:Image id="vip_img" y="-7" anchorOffsetX="0" width="115" anchorOffsetY="0" height="105" x="-15" source="{data.vipLevel}"/>

	<e:Image id="frame_img" width="60" height="60" x="11.5" y="14" source="chat_input_png" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" locked="true" visible="false"/>

	<e:Label id="gold_lb" text="{data.remainder}" size="23" textColor="0xf8f87e" textAlign="left" anchorOffsetX="0" width="110" anchorOffsetY="0" height="24" x="295" verticalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Image x="252" anchorOffsetX="0" width="45" anchorOffsetY="0" height="45" verticalCenter="0" source="3chat_coin_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.UserListSkin3" width="408" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="loadingTip">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{loading_img}">
				<tween:To duration="3000">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{360}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Scroller width="386" height="700" x="10" y="10">
		<e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
			<e:List id="noseat_lst" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.UserListItemSkin3" width="100%">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="justify" verticalAlign="top" paddingTop="0"/>
				</e:layout>
				<e:ArrayCollection>
					<e:Array>
						<e:Object id="null" headUrl="null" nickName="null" remainder="null"/>
					</e:Array>
				</e:ArrayCollection>
			</e:List>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Image id="loading_img" source="chat_loading_png" anchorOffsetX="18" anchorOffsetY="18" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

		<e:Button id="roomType_btn" label="" x="5.5" verticalCenter="0.5">
			<e:skinName>

		<!--<e:Button id="voice_btn" label="" x="282" y="14" visible="false">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="chat_voice_normal_png" source.down="chat_voice_selected_png" />
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />

	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Group id="chat_select_grp" x="15" y="590">

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="chessCommonLib.UserListSkin1" width="400" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="loadingTip">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{loading_img}">
				<tween:To duration="3000">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object rotation="{360}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Scroller width="363" height="680" x="19" y="20">
		<e:Group>
			<e:List id="noseat_lst" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" right="0" left="0" itemRendererSkinName="chessCommonLib.UserListItemSkin1">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="justify" verticalAlign="top" paddingTop="0"/>
				</e:layout>
				<e:ArrayCollection>
					<e:Array>
						<e:Object id="null" headUrl="null" nickName="null" remainder="null"/>

			</e:List>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Scroller>
	<e:Image id="loading_img" source="chat_loading_png" anchorOffsetX="18" anchorOffsetY="18" x="202" y="361"/>
</e:Skin>
